statements: SELECT * FROM field_experiments_environmental_data;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date FROM field_experiments_environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM field_experiments_environmental_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT experiment_date, humidity, temperature FROM field_experiments_environmental_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, temperature, humidity FROM field_experiments_environmental_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM field_experiments_environmental_data;
SELECT experiment_id, temperature, humidity FROM field_experiments_environmental_data WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, humidity FROM field_experiments_environmental_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM field_experiments_environmental_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM field_experiments_environmental_data;
SELECT * FROM field_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, location FROM field_experiments;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE measurement_type = 'temperature';
SELECT experiment_id, measurement_time, measurement_value FROM experimental_data ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM field_experiments WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM field_experiments WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT experiment_date, location FROM field_experiments WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT SUM(temperature), AVG(humidity) FROM field_experiments
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM field_experiments GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE measurement_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM FieldLocations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FieldLocations;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading, timestamp FROM SensorData;
SELECT data_id, experiment_date, temperature, humidity FROM ExperimentData;
SELECT * FROM FieldLocations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FieldLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FieldLocations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_date, temperature, humidity FROM ExperimentData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading, timestamp FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentData WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM FieldLocations WHERE latitude > 40);
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT site_name, location FROM field_sites WHERE elevation > 500;
SELECT measurement_date, temperature FROM measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, contact_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT measurements.measurement_date, measurements.temperature, researchers.researcher_name FROM measurements JOIN researchers ON measurements.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id
SELECT experiments.experiment_id, field_sites.site_name, field_sites.elevation FROM experiments JOIN field_sites ON experiments.experiment_id = field_sites.site_id
SELECT experiment_name, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM measurements GROUP BY experiment_name HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT * FROM Experiment;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiment ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_model FROM Sensor ORDER BY sensor_type;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, measurement FROM Data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Experiment;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiment ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_model FROM Sensor ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM Analysis WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
